org.apache.maven.plugin.deltacoverage.scm
Class CVSExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.deltacoverage.scm.AbstractSCMExecutor
      org.apache.maven.plugin.deltacoverage.scm.CVSExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
SCMExecutor
public class CVSExecutor
extends AbstractSCMExecutor

Implements the SCMExecutor interface for CVS version control system. Extends AbstractSCMExecutor class to implement SCM specific methods. Relies on command line execution of CVS command. Hence, it is necessary that a CVS client is installed and CVS command can be executed from command line. Uses ProcessBuilder to build a command. The command is then executed and the output is parsed to populate list of ClassChange.

Author:
Abhijeet_Kesarkar

Executes diff command to retrieve changes in source code since the specified baseline version.
